ygData.subject: Re: Why bards DON'T stink
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I look forward to getting Lullaby, but it is 2 levels away at this stage.  Painful to get to from where I am. ... Interesting idea, and I d probably do
ygData.messageBody:
John Kim wrote:
> Which is why I think lullaby is so great! :-) They're all
> targeting me, but they're not attacking so who cares.

I look forward to getting Lullaby, but it is 2 levels away at this
stage. Painful to get to from where I am.

> > This is the main weakness to a bard as I see it.
> > If your party is taking on monoliths, then you have no problem, but
> > in a mob-hunt, you are dead meat.
>
> I've started adding Jonathan's Whistling Warsong to the songs
> I twist in a group simply for the added AC to cut down on the
> amount of damage I take.

Interesting idea, and I'd probably do just that if I was able to
reliably twist 3 songs. However, with a ping never being below
600, that seems more reliant on luck than skill.

rocket
